name: siRNA
description: Guide RNA sequence 5'→3' using U (not T)

name: mRNA
description: Target mRNA segment complementary to the siRNA

name: extended_mRNA
description: Target region including flanking context around the site

name: efficacy
description: Scalar efficacy label for the siRNA–target pair

name: binary
description: Classification label derived from efficacy

name: source
description: Source study or dataset of the interaction

name: cell_line
description: Experimental cell line used for measurement

name: DG_sum_f1
description: Sum of 18 dinucleotide ΔG plus initiation (+4.09) + symmetry (+0.43) + terminal bonuses (+0.45 for 5' A and +0.45 for 3' U) in kcal/mol

name: DG_pos1
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 1–2 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos2
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 2–3 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos3
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 3–4 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos4
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 4–5 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos5
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 5–6 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos6
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 6–7 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos7
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 7–8 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos8
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 8–9 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos9
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 9–10 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos10
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 10–11 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos11
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 11–12 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos12
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 12–13 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos13
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 13–14 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos14
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 14–15 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos15
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 15–16 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos16
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 16–17 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos17
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 17–18 (kcal/mol)

name: DG_pos18
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔG for siRNA positions 18–19 (kcal/mol)

name: ends
description: 5'−3' end ΔG difference with end-type adjustment (kcal/mol)

name: DH_1
description: Nearest-neighbor ΔH for siRNA positions 1–2 (kcal/mol)

name: U_1
description: Indicator 1 if siRNA base 1 is U; else 0

name: G_1
description: Indicator 1 if siRNA base 1 is G; else 0

name: DH_all
description: Sum of 18 dinucleotide ΔH plus initiation (+3.61) and AU-end bonuses (+3.72 each if end is A or U) in kcal/mol

name: U_all
description: Fraction of U bases in siRNA (count/19)

name: UU_1
description: Indicator 1 if dinucleotide 1–2 is UU; else 0

name: G_all
description: Fraction of G bases in siRNA (count/19)

name: GG_1
description: Indicator 1 if dinucleotide 1–2 is GG; else 0

name: GC_1
description: Indicator 1 if dinucleotide 1–2 is GC; else 0

name: GG_all
description: Fraction of GG dinucleotides across 18 sliding windows (count/18)

name: UA_all
description: Fraction of UA dinucleotides across 18 sliding windows (count/18)

name: U_2
description: Indicator 1 if siRNA base 2 is U; else 0

name: C_1
description: Indicator 1 if siRNA base 1 is C; else 0

name: CC_all
description: Fraction of CC dinucleotides across 18 sliding windows (count/18)

name: CC_1
description: Indicator 1 if dinucleotide 1–2 is CC; else 0

name: GC_all
description: Fraction of GC dinucleotides across 18 sliding windows (count/18)

name: CG_1
description: Indicator 1 if dinucleotide 1–2 is CG; else 0

name: UU_all
description: Fraction of UU dinucleotides across 18 sliding windows (count/18)

name: A_19
description: Indicator 1 if siRNA base 19 is A; else 0

name: duplex_cofold_dG
description: Minimum free energy of siRNA–target duplex (kcal/mol); more negative implies stronger pairing

name: RNAup_open_dG
description: Energy to unpair target region to make it accessible (kcal/mol)

name: RNAup_interaction_dG
description: Hybridization energy between accessible regions (kcal/mol)

name: RNAup_total_dG
description: Sum of opening and interaction energies (kcal/mol)
